desc: Databases are the nerve center of our economy. Every piece of your personal information is stored there-medical records, bank accounts, employment history, pensions, car registrations, even your children’s grades and what groceries you buy. Database attacks are potentially crippling-and relentless.

details.authors: David Litchfield, Chris Anley, John Heasman, Bill Grindlay

title: The Database Hacker’s Handbook: Defending Database Servers
